revised_title: Improving the Method for Determining the Angle of Aperture of Microscopic Object-Glasses
tldr: The author presents a new method for accurately determining the angle of aperture of microscopic object-glasses, which involves using a hollow cone and an examining microscope to measure the central pencil of rays, excluding oblique pencils. This method improves upon the previous method, which was less accurate due to the inclusion of oblique rays.
